name: One Hit KO (itch)
description:
A 2D platform shooter

Controls

In the title screen:

Change option--------Arrow keys

Select an option-----Space_bars,Enter, OR Left_Click

In the game:

Movement------------WASD

Shoot----------------Left_Click

Pause----------------Esc

Other Info

The game auto-saves every time a level is completed

Each weapon has different fire rates/bullets

The red button in the title screen will delete the saved file
